body_html:
Hmm, then the SGD implementation should be fixed to satisfy that invariant.

I'll leave it to you guys to determine whether or not this is a necessary invariant -- feel free to revert as you see fit.

body:
Hmm, then the SGD implementation should be fixed to satisfy that invariant.

I'll leave it to you guys to determine whether or not this is a necessary invariant -- feel free to revert as you see fit.
